| History                 = The Doka'abi Clan was a tribe formed by [[Bahng (Earth-616)|Headman Bahng]] for protection, and it was originally comprised of civil servants, scribes and mechanics from the city of [[It'Jam]] in [[Sakaar]]. Once several tribes were united under the [[Warlord (Sakaar) (Earth-616)|Warlord]]'s rule, the Doka'abi Clan was chased into the desert.

When the Warlord's forces demanded the Doka'abi Clan to run the gauntlet, a challenge for survival, Bahng's clan attempted to contact the [[Bruce Banner (Earth-616)|Hulk]] for help so he could represent his clan as their champion. Their call for help was heeded by [[Amadeus Cho (Earth-616)|Amadeus Cho]], the successor of the late Bruce Banner.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 709}}

Following his victory over the Gauntlet and the fall of the Warlord, the Hulk and his ally [[Thor Odinson (Earth-616)|Odinson]] helped the Doka'abi build a fortified village so they could begin rebuilding civilization.{{r|Incredible Hulk Vol 1 713}}
